title: Sweet Bedtime Tales: 10 Minute Short Stories: 16 Tales of Adventure for Kids!
description: This collection includes some of the funniest short stories out there. You won't want to pass this one up!All of these stories are easy to read and will help your children learn lessons, morals, and build character. Some of these short stories are kind and cute, some are exciting and adventurous.One thing I do know? Once you start reading you won't want to stop!Kids love the friendly characters!Grandparents love reading these books to their grandchildren!**Scroll up and click "Buy Now" to reserve your copy now!**
author: Betty J. Byers
